top_comments_top.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*

"Organizing" and "preparing" action isn't the problem. 

The problem is a never-ending *preparation for* action and never actual action.
If the Biden administration does nothing for student debt relief I will not vote for them in 2024.

While I think people want change, it’s too slow to arrive, and they’ve resigned to live within this system. Anguish is taxing when all you ever hear is Sinema, Manchin, Congress can only do this, Biden can do this, etc.
My check is already being garnished again for student loans💀

top_comments_best.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*

While I think people want change, it’s too slow to arrive, and they’ve resigned to live within this system. Anguish is taxing when all you ever hear is Sinema, Manchin, Congress can only do this, Biden can do this, etc.

"Organizing" and "preparing" action isn't the problem. 

The problem is a never-ending *preparation for* action and never actual action.
My check is already being garnished again for student loans💀

A good education shouldn't cost this much, period. The amount of debt that has burdened this generation is a consequence if greed, plain and simple. These children could not have known how this situation would play out, and yes, when they registered for classes and studied in college they were very much children. You don't "prepare" for college so much as you "do everything you can to get in because society instills fear from birth about not having a degree".

Fear + ignorance + adult encouragement = a decision you couldn't possibly be prepared for.
